# ti-row

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description      | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ---------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `extClass` | `ext-class` | 额外的类名，添加到根节点的元素上 | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `extStyle` | --          | 额外的样式            | `{}`      | `{}`        |
| `flex`     | `flex`      | 是否是 flex 布局      | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `gutter`   | `gutter`    | 列元素之间的间距         | `number`  | `0`         |
